title: Dictionary App
description: A feature-rich Dictionary app built using React. Users can search for almost any word, bookmark their favorites, and listen to pronunciations.

title: N-Puzzle Game
description: A modernized version of the classic 15-puzzle game, built using React. While the CSS isn't fully optimized, this project highlights my problem-solving and coding skills. The goal is to arrange the tiles in numerical order with an empty space at the bottom-right corner.
